frontMatter.title: Year 2038 problem - Wikipedia
frontMatter.summary: The year 2038 problem (also known as Y2038,[1] Y2K38, Y2K38 superbug or the Epochalypse[2][3]) is a time formatting bug in computer systems with representing times after 03:14:07 UTC on 19 January 2038. An...
